name: NecroMan
description:
Use arrow keys or WASD to move camera.

Click on pieces to move them and click again to see pieces you can attack

You can capture only Neutral pieces, but you can drag them onto the screen (around NecroMan) to summon them as your pieces. 

Try to beat the enemy!

Link to Repo: https://github.com/joshuahoem/GameDevGameJam2022
